synopsis.text: After years of living an ordinary life, Ittoki Sakuraba is plunged into the secret and perilous world of ninjas when he discovers his true identity as the 19th heir of the Iga clan. The Iga and their rival clan, Koga, have been engaged in a bitter and covert war for centuries. As Ittoki grapples with his newfound heritage, he must quickly master the art of ninjutsu to fend off the looming threats. His life takes an unexpected turn when a seemingly innocent date request from a second-year student, Satomi Tsubaki, reveals her true intentions as a Koga assassin. With the help of his protector, Kosetsu, and his family, Ittoki embarks on a journey of self-discovery and survival at the prestigious Kokuten Ninja Academy, the last remaining ninja school in Japan. Will Ittoki be able to navigate the treacherous world of ninjas and protect his newfound legacy? Join him in this thrilling adventure as he uncovers the secrets of his lineage and fights to preserve his clan's honor.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
